Name: Bingo Hall
About the game: The complete bingo party game! use 'Local' mode to host your own parties with any number of people! Just display the game on a computer, TV or projector and have all your participants play along using real bingo cards with dabbers/chips, mobile phones, etc. Online Use 'Online' mode to host a game of up to 50 people! Have all your participants go to the URL 'bigbash.games' on any device with a browser and use the generated room code to join in! You can play sitting around your TV, projecting in a large hall, or streaming online! The perfect way to have fun with all of your friends/family during the pandemic. Current Patterns: 1 Line, 2 Lines, 4 corners, T, X, Full card. That's a Bingo!
